title: TFT & League Of Legends OCE Discord

embed.description: Check out the The Rift community on Discord - hang out with 218 other members and enjoy free voice and text chat.

body:
Hey guys I made this discord server in hopes of growing a decent sized community where you can meet & talk to people and play games with everyone, I will be doing give aways and host tournaments for league and other games in the future as the server grows.

There's lots of roles that you can earn at the moment and I'm going to be adding a lot more.
There's also music bots, leveling bots and more.

If you'd like to come join and help the community grow then feel free to join, everyone is welcome, we currently have about 220 members and growing, thank you for your time anyone that read this.
